name: Terbuka
greetingText: untuk Kang Fatwa dan Teh Ghiza
wishText: May the good things always be with you! ;)
text1: Thank you for being here on our journey.
textInChatBox: semoga kerja keras akang dan teteh terbayarkan suatu saat nanti, dan setiap kebaikannya akan di balas berkali lipat oleh yang maha kuasa.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell us if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
